item.description:
This is a 4 mile walk starting a Copley, following the Southwest Corridor path to Mass Ave, following the E line, passing the Longwood T stop, then crossing back over and up to end at Copley.

Here's the map.

By the time we'll get to the Fens area it'll be dark, but I will do another walk to get you guys through the gardens at some point.

And as usual, dinner if people are interested.

There is a Red Sox game at 7pm, so keep that in mind when taking the T or driving into the area. It will add to your travel time.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be right inside the main entrance facing Dartmouth St.
item.name: Copley, the E-Line and a dash through the Fens
